  16. (* Registering OCaml values with the C runtime for later callbacks *)

  18. external register_named_value : string -> Obj.t -> unit
  19.                               = "caml_register_named_value"

  21. ‌let register name v =
  22.   register_named_value name (Obj.repr v)

  24. ‌let register_exception name (exn : exn) =
  25.   let exn = Obj.repr exn in
  26.   let slot = if Obj.tag exn = Obj.object_tag then exn else Obj.field exn 0 in
  27.   register_named_value name slot
